description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. Through this project, NOWACO A/S wishes to substitute part of its export for the Nigerian market by establishing an integrated broiler farm in Edo state, where the Nigerian co-investors have identified a piece of land. Based on a pre-feasibility study carried out in 2017, NOWACO A/S now wants to look more into detail regarding cost of construction and equipment and investigate the possibility of an alternative power source to diesel generators. Also some issues were raised in the 2017 report about feed supply day old chicks, which have to be investigated further. Being an agricultural and by creating 40 jobs, the project will contribute to the SDGs in several ways and comply with Nigeria’s development strategy.
